meanings.definition: In a manner that is calm and composed, especially in difficult or stressful situations.
meanings.sent1: She handled the crisis unflappably, never showing any signs of panic.
meanings.sent2: He unflappably faced the challenges at work with a steady demeanor.
meanings.sent3: Even when the cake fell on the floor, she unflappably continued baking as if nothing happened.
meanings.sent4: Like a sturdy oak tree in a storm, he stood unflappably amidst chaos.
meanings.sent5: Her unflappably serene presence calmed everyone around her.

meanings.definition: Showing no signs of being upset or agitated.
meanings.sent1: The unflappably cool cat lounged in the sun without a care in the world.
meanings.sent2: She remained unflappably composed even when faced with unexpected news.
meanings.sent3: The unflappably chill penguin waddled along the icy shore, unfazed by the cold.
meanings.sent4: His unflappably smooth dance moves captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The unflappably confident detective solved the case with ease.
